response.summary:
Frontend developer, with three years of professional experience developing web and mobile applications, 
using best practices for coding, applying architectural patterns and design patterns to ensure software 
quality standards. I have led small teams (6 developers, 1 UI/UX, 1 tester) for small and medium 
applications using Scrum methodologies. Additionally, I have experience in the following technologies: 
React, Redux, Angular, Ionic, Spring, Python, C#, C++, SQL(MySql), NoSQL(Mongo, Firebase), Microsoft 
Azure, Git.
response.skills: Ingeniería, Desarrollo del front-end, Aplicaciones móviles, Aplicaciones web, Desarrollo de aplicaciones, Angular, HTML5, Hojas de estilos en cascada (CSS), Ionic Framework, React.js, HTML, Firebase, MongoDB, Python, Spring Framework, SQL, NoSQL, Scrum, Redux.js, Git

profile_positions.description:
• Lead the mobile and web applications development (organize task, specify requirements with 
stakeholders)
• Requirements gathering for web and mobile applications
• Lead programmer responsibilities (developer team guidance and pull request review)
• Research of technologies to support offline applications (offline first architecture)
• Define application architecture design
• Development of new features
• Support and bug fixes for finished applications
• Teamwork with remote team in Brazil
• Data integration with other organizations using API REST
• Technologies used: Ionic, Angular, Redux, Python, Firebase, MySql
profile_positions.title: Desarrollador de front-end

profile_positions.description:
• Optimize some parts of the mobile application architecture
• Create and develop user interface designs for new features
• Development of new requirements for web and mobile applications on front-end and back-end
• Teamwork with QAS team
• Application bug fixes
profile_positions.title: Desarrollador Junior

company.name: EPAM Anywhere
company.description:
EPAM Anywhere is a global job platform offering remote work opportunities for tech professionals. 

Discover a few thousand of open remote vacancies within EPAM – one of the most advanced engineering companies in the world.
 
Here, you can build a career around your lifestyle, receiving competitive compensation and access to world-class learning resources while working on projects for global brands and exciting startups. 
 
When you join Anywhere, you become a part of a community of like-minded people who committed to living life on their terms. 

Join us today at anywhere.epam.com. 

____

EPAM Anywhere is a part of EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM). Since 1993, EPAM has leveraged its advanced software engineering heritage to become the foremost global digital transformation services provider – leading the industry in digital and physical product development and digital platform engineering services.
